name: RaVR
description:
A VR Project about being a DJ at a music festival, playing mashups. These use mashups that I had previously made; some good, some bad. 

It's a bit old now, but I realized I never actually put it up anywhere once it was "complete," so I figure I'll put it here for anyone who's interested.

The crowds and some of the other art in the game is made by a buddy of mine: Josh Jerin.

My only problems: This was before I really learned a lot of Music Visualization and Tech Art techniques, as well as generally better practices for better modeling, programming, etc. The worst part is that it only works in Virtual Reality -- even if I just made a first person character real quick, all the controls are meant for a Newton VR Rig, so it'd be impossible to recover at this point.

If there is a sequel, I would definitely push it even further with interested music visualizations and abstractions, make a more advanced music controller that looks better with more details and more functionality, a proper game/scoring system somehow, better scene lighting and of course a desktop mode.

NOTE: Absolutely all credit to original music artists. If your music appears in here and you do not want it to, contact me immediately.
